urls.title: Dr. Anthony Fauci says WHO's remark on asymptomatic coronavirus spread 'was not correct'
urls.description: The WHO "walked that back because there's no evidence to indicate that's the case," Dr. Anthony Fauci says.

text:
Dr. Fauci stated epidemiological studies have confirmed asymptomatic people can transmit #COVID19 to others.

We are following guidelines from the White House & Dr. Fauci. Wear a mask, wash your hands and practice social distancing. https://t.co/662zupw8nQ
